attributes.action: Introduce Legislation to force an "Interest freeze", when non payment of debt is proven to be due to exceptional circumstances such as Marriage Breakdown.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Implement a scheme where genuine people can legally pay off a percentage of the debt over a longer period & (providing the smaller payment arrangement is adhered too) the creditor must start to show these payments on the credit record. 
So helping people reduce the stress surrounding such times, whilst allowing the debt to be paid. 
This would reduce the horrendous charges put on by some companies, even though the debtor is continually paying an amount they can afford. 
This would also reduce the use of “bullyboy, underhand” tactics employed by some debt collection agencies, which employ the “lack of clear legislation” as a means to add out of proportion charges.
This would also help genuine people get their life back in order after such trauma as a marriage breakdown, quicker than if they are forced to become blacklisted/bankrupt & in some case moved to depression/suicide.
